prompt:
How can I write about a unique travel experience that taught me something unexpected?
Imagine you're traveling through rural China by train. After a long day of sightseeing, you decide to order dinner from the restaurant car. To your surprise, the waiter brings out not only Chinese food but also local specialties like fried scorpions and starfish on sticks! Though initially put off, you find yourself curious about these delicacies, asking questions about their taste and preparation process. Eventually, you try some of them under the waiter's guidance and discover that they taste much better than expected – even quite delicious! This experience not only broadened your culinary horizons but also taught you an important lesson about open-mindedness towards new experiences.
